description:
A playful dress that's a no-fuss solution for casual occasions. Crossover V-neck and tapered straps add tailored detail front and back. A-line silhouette and above-knee length means unrestricted beach walks.Made of soft, organically grown cotton slub-knit jersey with a little spandex for stretch.Semi-flared with an A-line sweep that falls nicely.Fair Trade Certified sewing.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Patagonia Amber Dawn Dress - Women's
